page.title: 05MORRISTON, SWANSEA
page.content: Morriston is a northern suburb of Swansea, consisting mainly of housing, one main shopping street and, on its fringe, the new Enterprise Park. The housing is a mixture of houses built before World War I, modern houses built after World War II, and Council houses. Woodfield Street is the main shopping centre, with a wide variety of businesses ranging from supermarkets to small, individually owned premises. The new Enterprise Park is being developed to the east. Industrial firms, supermarkets and a hotel complex have all been enticed to this zone, which is being developed into a very attractive area. Morriston is near the M4 and within easy reach of popular tourist places such as Gower and the Brecon Beacons.
